rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî fresh Neapolitan pizza with charred crust
rounds.pro_tip: CHAR PATTERNS: Real pizza char is random and organic ‚Äî no two bubbles are alike, and the browning follows the dough's natural irregularities. AI char tends to look stamped or repetitively patterned.
CHEESE PHYSICS: Real melted cheese has natural pooling, browning variation, and strings that taper naturally. AI cheese looks like a smooth orange layer poured uniformly across the surface.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî pepperoni pizza overhead shot
rounds.pro_tip: PEPPERONI PLACEMENT: Real pepperoni slices have natural variation ‚Äî some curled at edges, some flat, varying sizes, grease pooling differently on each. AI pepperoni tends to be uniform circles.
SURFACE TEXTURE: Real pizza surfaces show the grain of flour dusting, tiny air bubbles in the dough, and uneven sauce coverage. AI creates a suspiciously smooth, uniform surface.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî cheese pull from pizza slice
rounds.pro_tip: CHEESE STRETCH: Real cheese pulls have natural tapering ‚Äî thicker near the slice, threading into thin strands that break at different points. AI cheese pulls look like uniform rubber bands.
BACKGROUND OBJECTS: Check items around the main subject ‚Äî napkins, utensils, condiment bottles. AI background objects often have melted edges, impossible perspectives, or text that doesn't read.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî pizzaiolo tossing dough in kitchen
rounds.pro_tip: FLOUR DUST: Real kitchen environments have flour particles catching light, creating a natural haze. AI either omits this entirely or adds it as a uniform fog layer.
PLATE AND TABLE: Real plates have visible fingerprints, minor scratches, and natural shadows. Real tables show grain, stains, and wear. AI creates impossibly pristine surfaces.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî wood-fired pizza oven with flames
rounds.pro_tip: FIRE BEHAVIOR: Real flames have chaotic, asymmetric movement with varying color (blue base, orange tips, yellow highlights). AI fire is often too symmetrical with uniform coloring.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî fresh ingredients and food prep
rounds.pro_tip: INGREDIENT VARIETY: Real fresh ingredients have natural blemishes, size variation, and organic shapes. AI produces vegetables and herbs that look like they came from a 3D model library ‚Äî too uniform, too perfect.
